page.title: 06CLUBS IN DEERNESS
page.content: The{Young Farmers' Club}is for men and women between the ages of l4 and 26, who meet each fortnight, with programmes aimed at improving agricultural skills. They also take part in speech-making and concert competitions, stock judging, fashion shows and drama. The{Lifeboat Guild}is a small group of women whose main purpose is to raise funds for the support of Britain's lifeboats. The {Woman's Guild}is attached to the church and meets each month in the summer. There are groups for pre-school children which combine with St. Andrews. The largest group is the {Scottish Women's Rural Institute, which meets monthly to further home and community life and craftsmanship. They were responsible for the compilation of this entry.
